1.title: managing your python environment
1.description: Setting up a new virtual environment is very important in order to keep your dependency list clean and manageable. These resources will help you initialize a new virtualenv and install the necessary dependencies to set up a Django application.

resources.description: This blog post goes into the details of why and how you should set up your virtual environment.

1.goal: By the end of this section, you should have a working virtual environment that you can activate and deactivate. You should be able to run `pip list` and see a minimal list of dependencies.
